title: Helena Bonham Carter looks blissfully happy as she poses up with toyboy Rye Dag Holmboe
text:

Helena Bonham Carter looked happy as can be as she posed up on the black carpet with her boyfriend.

The actress looked stunning as she attended the Harper's Bazaar Women of the Year Awards in her signature quirky style.

The 53-year-old, who is playing Princess Margaret in Netflix series The Crown, looked sensational in a black mid-length dress with a frilly bardot neckline.

She completed her look with tights and strappy black heels with a bejewelled buckle, a fascinator and sheer gloves.

Helena proudly posed up with her toyboy Rye Dag Holmboe, 32.

Linking his arm, she smiled with him by her side as they headed into the event at Claridge's Hotel, in London.

(Image: Dave Benett)

(Image: Dave Benett)

In one sweet picture, writer Rye looks down at his girlfriend with a besotted look on his face and she looks blissfully happy to be with him.

The couple were first linked in October 2018.

Helena dated Hollywood director Tim Burton from 2001 to 2014.

They famously lived in two adjoining houses in London throughout their relationship and he regularly cast her in his dark fantasy films.

(Image: PA)

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

They share children Billy Raymond and Nell.

Sources close to Helena say her relationship with Rye was thought of as a fling at first, but that she's proven everyone wrong.

The insider told the Mail On Sunday : "Everyone thought it was a fling but it now seems to be hotting up as they are joined at the hip.

(Image: PA)

(Image: PA)

"Some people are surprised that Helena has found someone who is younger and from a different walk of life, but others are less surprised as it is very like her to do the unexpected."

The loved-up couple weren't the only stars at the awards tonight.

Singer Jorja Smith stunned in a bright yellow halterneck dress with a plunging neckline and daring thigh split.

(Image: PA)

(Image: PA)

Rosie Huntington-Whiteley braved the cold as she posed up in a barely-there black dress with dramatic cut-outs.

Fiancé Jason Statham - looking sharp in a suit - wrapped an arm around her as they posed for pictures.

And Alexa Chung cut a stylish figure in a long grey blazer jacket with a cute white dress underneath.
